title: Save new Files received on Telegram to Google Drive
author: Manuel

readme:
Effortlessly optimize your workflow by automatically save all files you are receiving on Telegram to a Google Drive Folder.

## How it works

  1. Retrieve a message sent to your Telegram Bot containing a file
  2. Upload the file to your Google Drive Folder



## Set up Steps

  1. Create a Telegram Account and a Telegram Bot and connect your Telegram Bot to n8n by following [the official n8n instructions](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/credentials/telegram/?utm_source=n8n_app&utm_medium=credential_settings&utm_campaign=create_new_credentials_modal#using-bot-access-token)
  2. Create a Google Drive Folder
  3. Connect your Google Drive with n8n following [the official n8n instructions](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.googledrive/?utm_source=n8n_app&utm_medium=node_settings_modal-credential_link&utm_campaign=n8n-nodes-base.googleDrive)
  4. Set the right folder in the Google Drive node



## Use case examples

  * Backup and Recovery
  * Cross-Platform Access
  * File Organization and Management
  * File Collaboration and Sharing
  * Storage Space Management
readme_html:
Effortlessly optimize your workflow by automatically save all files you are receiving on Telegram to a Google Drive Folder.

How it works

  1. Retrieve a message sent to your Telegram Bot containing a file
  2. Upload the file to your Google Drive Folder

Set up Steps

  1. Create a Telegram Account and a Telegram Bot and connect your Telegram Bot to n8n by following the official n8n instructions
  2. Create a Google Drive Folder
  3. Connect your Google Drive with n8n following the official n8n instructions
  4. Set the right folder in the Google Drive node

Use case examples

  • Backup and Recovery
  • Cross-Platform Access
  • File Organization and Management
  • File Collaboration and Sharing
  • Storage Space Management
readme_zh:
轻松优化工作流程，自动将您在Telegram上接收的所有文件保存至Google Drive文件夹

## 运作原理

  1. 获取发送至Telegram机器人的含文件消息
  2. 将文件上传至您的Google Drive文件夹

## 配置步骤

  1. 创建Telegram账户及机器人，并按照[n8n官方指南](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/credentials/telegram/?utm_source=n8n_app&utm_medium=credential_settings&utm_campaign=create_new_credentials_modal#using-bot-access-token)将机器人接入n8n
  2. 创建Google Drive文件夹
  3. 依照[n8n官方指引](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.googledrive/?utm_source=n8n_app&utm_medium=node_settings_modal-credential_link&utm_campaign=n8n-nodes-base.googleDrive)连接Google Drive与n8n
  4. 在Google Drive节点中设置目标文件夹

## 应用场景示例

  * 数据备份与恢复
  * 跨平台访问
  * 文件整理与管理
  * 团队协作与共享
  * 存储空间管理
title_zh: 将Telegram上收到的新文件保存到Google Drive
publish_date_zh: 最后一次更新于一年前
